<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.setDesc(HII.get(Hexagon::A2&#95;addi));</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!HII.isValidOffset(Opc, RealOffset, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the offset is not valid, calculate the address in a temporary</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register and use it with offset 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InstOffset = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The actual base register (BP) is typically shared between many</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions where frame indices are being replaced. In scalar</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions the offset range is large, and the need for an extra</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// add instruction is infrequent. Vector loads/stores, however, have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a much smaller offset range: &#91;-8, 7), or #s4. In those cases it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// makes sense to &quot;standardize&quot; the immediate in the &quot;addi&quot; instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// so that multiple loads/stores could be based on it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsPair = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// All of these instructions have the same format: base+#s4.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Hexagon::PS&#95;vloadrw&#95;ai:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">        IsPair = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#91;&#91;fallthrough&#93;&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Hexagon::PS&#95;vloadrv&#95;ai:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Hexagon::PS&#95;vstorerv&#95;ai:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Hexagon::PS&#95;vstorerv&#95;nt&#95;ai:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Hexagon::V6&#95;vL32b&#95;ai:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Hexagon::V6&#95;vS32b&#95;ai: &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HwLen = HST.getVectorLength();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RealOffset % HwLen == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VecOffset = RealOffset / HwLen;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Rewrite the offset as &quot;base + &#91;-8, 7)&quot;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">          VecOffset += 8;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pairs are expanded into two instructions: make sure that both</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can use the same base (i.e. VecOffset+1 is not a different</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// multiple of 16 than VecOffset).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!IsPair || (VecOffset + 1) % 16 != 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">            RealOffset = (VecOffset &amp; -16) &#42; HwLen;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">            InstOffset = (VecOffset % 16 - 8) &#42; HwLen;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Both must be true, because the case for both being false was</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// checked earlier. Both registers will be coalesced into a register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of a wider class (HvxWR), and we don&#39;t want its live range to</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">           !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a61d13d6824ec46c31260a4fd0997eda0">any&#95;of</a>(LIS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveintervals/#a8208eacaf02c9742c8ed7f09ec0837f3">getInterval</a>(SrcReg), HasCall);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If one register is large (HvxWR) and the other is small (HvxVR), then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// coalescing is ok if the large is already live across a function call,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// or if the small one is not.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> SmallReg = SmallSrc ? SrcReg : DstReg;</span></CodeLine>
